# Talinn Runewright
## Overview
---
## Connections
General Family: [[Nyssa Tasstani]] ; Talinn is Nyssa's uncle.
Child: [[Kraken King]] ; Talinn is the son of the Kraken King.
General Family: [[Navid]] ; Navid and Talinn are brothers.
General Family: [[Gorim the Boarslayer]] ; Gorim and Talinn are brothers.
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Runeport]] ; Talinn is the leader of Runeport.
Master: [[Zonoveth]] ; Zonoveth is a spy for Talinn.
Parent: [[Tomas]] ; Tomas is Talinn's son.
Peer: [[Felicia]] ; Felicia and Talinn are former lovers.
Resident: [[Runeport]] ; Talinn lives in Runeport.
